root: ^I think we lost him for now.
^Great, now what do we do? You got any special binding powers?
^No, who do you think I am? Don’t you have any ghost capturing tools?
^I have ghost-vaporizing ones… We don’t really go the capturing route for confronting ghosts.
^Right, so we’re both useless and out of options?
^I have salt, holy water, a flashlight, EMF reader… my incantation book — that’s it! I think I have binding incantations.
^Archibald, will you be able to distract him while I chant?
^> Player and Archibald walk around a litte
^> Archibald flings himself towards the other ghost immediately and tries to wrestle him into the ground.
